::Feline:: 

She looked up at Iron Raptor with tears still running down her=
 
cheeks.  She took her hand and walked over to her seat. She hung her 
hea=
d low and didn't look Iron Raptor in the eyes.  She put her arms 
around he=
r and hugged herself.  She shook a little and sat there 
staring at the flo=
or. She still had tears running down her face.  She 
sobbed a bit longer th=
en wiped her face with her hand. " I wanted to 
thank you for letting me st=
ay here. I appreciate it."  She hung her 
head and her shoulders. She kept =
looking at the floor as tears ran 
down her cheeks again.  She whispered, "=
They frightened me. And they 
still do frighten me."  She covered her hands=
 with her face and wept.
